A web platform exploring the intersection of artificial intelligence and human psychology, showcasing latest research findings on how AI impacts human cognition, emotion, and behavior.

### Features

- **Research Findings**: Curated summaries of 17+ academic papers from top journals (Nature, Science, JMIR)
- **Paper Database**: Comprehensive collection of AI-psychology research from 2024-2026
- **Neural Network Aesthetic**: Dark-themed design with glassmorphism effects and smooth animations
- **Bilingual**: Chinese and English content support

### Tech Stack

- **Frontend**: React 19, TypeScript, Vite
- **Routing**: Wouter with base path configuration
- **UI**: Radix UI components + Tailwind CSS
- **Animations**: Framer Motion
- **Deployment**: GitHub Actions auto-deployment
